00050     <?php
00051     // Include CKEditor class.
00052     include_once "../../ckeditor.php";
00053     // Create class instance.
00054     $CKEditor = new CKEditor();
00055     // Path to CKEditor directory, ideally instead of relative dir, use an absolute path:
00056     //   $CKEditor->basePath = '/ckeditor/'
00057     // If not set, CKEditor will try to detect the correct path.
00058     $CKEditor->basePath = '../../';
00059     // Replace textarea with id (or name) "editor1".
00060     $CKEditor->replace("editor1");
00061     ?>
